grootslang.description: This enormous beast has the combined features of an elephant and a serpent. Its tremendous maw sports six frightening tusks.

giant spider.description: A spider the size of a man crawls silently from the depths of its funnel-shaped web.

ancient cloud dragon.description: The blue-white scales of this four-horned Dragon exude wisps of fog. The dragons snout is short but filled with sharp teeth.

shocker lizard.description: This dog-sized lizard has two horns, one on either side of its head, and green scales that crackle with sparks of lightning.

vexgit.description: With a head like an angry crustacean, this fierce little insectoid creature clacks and rattles with a tiny but solid-looking hammer.

nixie.description: This green-skinned fey has webbed hands and feet. Its hair is the color of seaweed, and is decorated with shells.

budget.name: nixie
budget.treasure: standard (light crossbow with 20 bolts, short sword, other treasure)

deadfall scorpion.description: Thick sheets of moss and other forest debris cling to the dark green carapace of this huge scorpion.

pukwudgie.description: A merging of an emaciated man and a porcupine, this sinister creature smells of death and decay.

efreeti.description: This muscular giant has crimson skin, smoldering eyes, and small black horns. Smoke rises in curls from its flesh.

doppelganger.description: This grayish humanoid creature seems almost unfinished, with a narrow head, gaunt limbs, and a sinister, noseless face.

mobogo.description: This grotesque creature looks like a gigantic toad with leathery wings, fangs, horns, and three bulbous eyes.

moon-beast.description: This creature has a pale, froglike appearance with clawed hands, no eyes, a wide mouth, and a snout ending in pink tentacles.

cetaceal.description: This mermaid-like creature has the torso and head of a long-haired woman and the lower half of a sleek killer whale.

budget.name: cetaceal
budget.treasure: double (+1 shocking burst shortspear, other treasure)

nephilim.description: The strength and stature of this giant-sized human is matched only by the nobility of its bearing.

budget.name: nephilim
budget.treasure: double (masterwork breastplate, +1 longsword, 4 masterwork spears, other treasure)

yithian.description: This bizarre creature has a conical body topped with four tentacles tipped with pincers, tubes, and a tentacled, spherical head.

ancient underworld dragon.description: This serpentine dragon has skin the color of deep volcanic rock, enormous claws, and jagged, stonelike horns and scales.

tendriculos.description: This plant's thick trunk is capped by a crown of wide leaves, whipping vines, mushrooms, and a ravenous purple maw.

festering spirit.description: This ghostlike creature reeks of the grave and drips with putrescent goo.

korada.description: This serene, acrobatic man has stiff sideburns, a beard like a monkey, and three golden-furred tails.

seaweed siren.description: This creature's three singing heads sway atop serpentine necks that extend from a bulbous body split by a wide, toothy mouth.

shinigami.description: This emaciated, robed humanoid wields a scythe made of bone to match the skeletal wings that protrude from its shoulders.

greater barghest.description: This snarling, canine beast pads forward on all fours, its slender front limbs looking more like hands than a wolf's paws.

maenad.description: This wild-looking woman is covered in spattered blood. Her wicked smile reveals sharp teeth and her eyes suggest insanity.

ghorazagh.description: With an armored spherical body, numerous tentacular legs,  and a multi-eyed visage, this creature is truly hideous.

lamia.description: This creature's upper torso is that of a comely woman with cat's eyes and sharp fangs, while her lower body is that of a lion.

howler.description: This vile predator has a hide as thick and tough as leather. Wicked ebony quills run from its head, tail, and back.

lukwata.description: A long, spiny fin runs down the length of the dolphinlike body of this eel-headed predator.

spring-heeled jack.description: With jet-black skin and a small but menacing pair of horns, this goateed, impish creature wields a bloody knife and a wicked grin.

azer.description: Heat ripples the air near this squat, brass-skinned humanoid. Its head and shoulders blaze with a mane of fire.

budget.name: azer
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork scale mail, masterwork warhammer, light hammer, other treasure)

broken soul lillend.description: Once a beautiful celestial with the torso of a winged woman and a snakelike body below, this creature is a mess of blood and scars.

budget.name: broken soul lillend
budget.treasure: standard (+1 longsword, masterwork harp, other treasure)

morlock.description: Skin pale as a slug's belly, eyes huge and bulging, this thing crawls down the wall like a spider, but its shape is hideously humanoid.

iathavos.description: This immense creature has four bat-like wings and a spherical body. Red eyes peer from all sides, and two huge claws dangle below.

shoggoth.description: This immense mound of black slime thunders forward, eyes and mouths and even stranger things forming in its heaving bulk.

neh-thalggu.description: This crab-like nightmare has a lamprey mouth, twitching eyes on its legs, and several blisters along its back that hold human brains.

adult brine dragon.description: A blue-green neck frill sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a body of shiny scales and fin-like crests.

blink dog.description: This sleek canine has a coarse, tawny coat, pointed ears, and pale eyes. A faint blue nimbus seems to dance upon its fur.

swan maiden.description: This tall, regal woman is clad in a long cloak of pristine white swan feathers and silvery armor with a winged helm.

budget.name: swan maiden
budget.treasure: standard (chain shirt, mwk longsword, longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

lhaksharut.description: This six-armed creature appears to be made of stone. Its lower torso is a collection of whirring rings of metal.

budget.name: lhaksharut
budget.treasure: double (+2 longsword, +2 spear, +2 morningstar, other treasure)

budget.name: pod-spawned guard captain
budget.treasure: NPC gear (+1 breastplate, heavy steel shield, +2 longsword, mwk light crossbow with 20 bolts, other treasure)

grendel.description: This lurching hulk carries no weapons, but its eyes burn with menace, and its long claws are caked with blood.

ancient magma dragon.description: Between this dragons jet-black scales run glowing rivulets of lava, and veins aglow with heat shine in the membranes of its wings.

changeling.description: This slender woman's skin is unnaturally pale, her hair is dark, and each of her eyes is a different color.

budget.name: changeling
budget.treasure: NPC gear (quarterstaff, spell component pouch, other treasure)

graven guardian.description: This jackal-headed, brightly painted clay statue animates and lurches forward, hefting a wickedly hooked sword.

shemhazian.description: This enormous, bestial demon combines the worst aspects of a bear, a mantis, a wolf, and a reptilian humanoid.

young bronze dragon.description: This sleek dragon is covered in dull metallic scales that range in color from shining bronze to mottled blue.

ankou.description: Cloaked by wings of darkness, this horrific, skeletal creature appears to burn from within.

young underworld dragon.description: This serpentine dragon has skin the color of deep volcanic rock, enormous claws, and jagged, stonelike horns and scales.

young sea dragon.description: The long, undulating body of this serpentine dragon rolls and bends with scales the color of the ocean's waves.

skaveling.description: This monstrously sized, undead bat has mottled, decayed flesh and eyes that smolder with an unholy green glow.

legion archon.description: This celestial knight bears a flaming blade as it flies through the air on metallic wings that seem to grow from its armor.

flying polyp.description: This nauseating, tapered tower of flesh, eyes, and tendrils writhes midair, surrounded by a strange vortex of sucking wind.

drider.description: The dry rasping of spidery legs brings this hideous monstrosity into view—a nightmarish, centaurian fusion of drow and spider.

budget.name: drider
budget.treasure: double (masterwork heavy mace, masterwork composite longbow [+2 Str] with 20 arrows, additional treasure)

dark caller.description: Wrapped in tatters of dark musty robes, this humanoid figure weaves malevolent magic.

budget.name: dark caller
budget.treasure: standard (mwk dagger, black smear [2 doses; Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 54], other gear)

brain ooze.description: Two slimy tentacles protrude from the sides of this brain-shaped mass of quivering ooze.

belier devil.description: This amphisbaenic monstrosity has the body of a slug with a leech's mouth at one end and a knot of three human heads at the other.

fire giant.description: This lumbering giant has short stumpy legs and powerful, muscular arms. Its hair and beard seem to be made of fire.

sea hag.description: Hair like rotting seaweed drapes this ancient witch. Loose, algae-colored skin sags off her starved frame.

julunggali.description: Resplendent lilac and white scales adorn this gigantic serpent. A number of sharp, short horns crown its head.

argus.description: This misshapen giant is covered in horns, tumorous tentacles, unsightly warts, and strange, staring eyes.

young solar dragon.description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

nightwalker.description: This towering, night-black giant has demonic features, including a huge pair of ram-like horns. Its arms end in massive blades.

astral leviathan.description: Above this brobdingnagian, whalelike creature's cavernous maw of freakish teeth, multiple eyes peer out in different directions.

gelatinous cube.description: Bits of broken weapons, coins, and a partially digested skeleton are visible inside this quivering cube of slime.

hydra.description: Multiple angry snake-like heads rise from the sleek, serpentine body of this terrifying monster.

gryph.description: This hawk-sized avian looks much like a six-legged stork. Its feathers are unkempt and greasy, and its beak is razor-sharp.

carnivorous crystal.description: The facets of this crystalline formation shift and vibrate, as though in anticipation.

pazuzu.description: Held aloft by four great feathered wings, this hawk-faced fiend has a scorpion's tail and carries a black metal scepter.

karkinoi.description: This hulking mix of ogre and crab has one huge pincer that snaps menacingly, while its other arm is a twisted, humanlike hand.

meladaemon.description: This foul creature looks like an emaciated humanoid with the head of a jackal.

slimy demodand.description: This muscular, frog-headed humanoid has tattered flesh hanging from its batlike wings and is covered in a viscous slime.

devilbound sorcerer.description: This elegant and mysterious woman has a sinister air of dark power around her, like a protective ward.

budget.name: devilbound sorcerer
budget.treasure: NPC gear (dagger, amulet of natural armor +3, belt of mighty constitution +2, cloak of resistance +3, headband of alluring charisma +4, brooch of shielding [50 points], potion of cure serious wounds, wand of false life [10 charges], diamond dust [250 gp], other treasure)

wereshark.description: This muscular creature has a human body, but the head of a ravenous shark, complete with jet-black eyes and razorlike teeth.

vampiric mist.description: A cloud of crimson vapor reeking of fresh blood hangs in the air, reaching out with lashing claws.

spriggan.description: Flecks of saliva drip from the corners of this filthy and ill-smelling humanoid, and his large pointed ears twitch at every sound.It resembles an ugly gnome with an alien, feral appearance.

budget.name: spriggan
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, masterwork morningstar, light crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

thrasfyr.description: Neither quite bear nor bull nor serpent, this immense, six-legged creature is bound in chains and covered with scintillating red scales.

fuath.description: This waterlogged gremlin has lobster claws for hands and an almost canine face with webbed ears.

thanatotic titan.description: This titanic, armored figure wields an immense axe. Its hands end in claws, and its voice thunders with ruinous power.

budget.name: thanatotic titan
budget.treasure: standard (+3 full plate, +3 unholy battleaxe, other treasure)

colour out of space.description: An eerie radiance, a glow unlike anything else, fills the area, bringing with it a stifling sense of latent malignancy.

satyr.description: This handsome, grinning man has the furry legs of a goat and a set of curling ram horns extending from his temples.

budget.name: satyr
budget.treasure: standard (dagger, short bow plus 20 arrows, masterwork panpipes, other treasure)

toshigami.description: This strangely beautiful old woman is composed completely of blossoms, bark, and antlerlike branches.

pit fiend.description: A pair of gigantic, flame-seared wings and eyes smoldering like embers give this towering devil a truly horrific appearance.

achaierai.description: This bird-like beast is mostly head, lunging forward on four scaly legs. Wisps of noxious black vapor trail from its hooked beak.

mu spore.description: Tentacles and eyes cover this floating, fungoid monster, and its vast mouth opens like a toothy cavern.

shadow roper.description: A tentacled horror that seems to shift in and out of the shadows, this bizarre beast is an amalgamation of darkness and menace.

fossegrim.description: This striking, blue-eyed man with luminous skin and flowing white hair holds an ethereal harp.

budget.name: fossegrim
budget.treasure: standard (mwk harp or violin, other treasure)

chimera.description: This winged monster has the body of a lion, though two more heads flank its central feline one—a dragon and a horned goat.

sylph.description: This pale, waifish woman, her hair waving in a nonexistent breeze, looks as if she might fade away into mist entirely at any minute.

budget.name: sylph
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, two daggers, other treasure)

spawn of yog-sothoth.description: The shape of this creature gives the impression of a squirming mass accompanied by an indescribable monstrous stench.

shambling mound.description: A mass of tangled vines and dripping slime rises on two trunk-like legs, reeking of rot and freshly turned earth.

saguaroi.description: This humanoid plant creature has the prickly hide of a cactus, and smaller cactuses seemingly sprout from its flesh.

mist drake.description: This lanky dragon's dappled grayish scales and sprawling wings shift and fade in color, blending in with the mist.

ancient brine dragon.description: A blue-green neck frill sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a body of shiny scales and fin-like crests.

huldra.description: This woman's foxlike tail and the wood-lined hollow inside her back reveal her true fey nature.

duergar.description: This bald, long-bearded dwarf has dull gray skin, low arching brows, and eyes that seem to absorb rather than reflect the light.

budget.name: duergar
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (chainmail, heavy steel shield, warhammer, light crossbow [20 bolts], 3d6 gp, other treasure)

xorn.description: This squat beast is as wide as it is tall. Strangely symmetrical, it has three arms, three legs, three eyes, and one huge mouth.

budget.name: xorn
budget.treasure: standard (precious metals, gems, and magic gems or jewelry only)

babau.description: This emaciated figure looks like a horned human skeleton smothered within a bone-tight hide of slimy leather.

shae.description: A white porcelain mask and elegant white clothing provide form and contrast to this shadowy woman's body.

cerebric fungus.description: A swollen, brainlike bulb encrusted with fungal shelves squats atop several ropy legs. A wide mouth bisects the bulb's crown.

young black dragon.description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

jubjub bird.description: This enormous bird has a lizardlike tail and bright purple feathers on its back and wings; the rest of its body is bare and scaly.

xill.description: This flame-red humanoid appears to be a strange mix of insect and reptile, with four arms and twitching, fanged mandibles.

budget.name: xill
budget.treasure: standard (heavy steel shield, 2 short swords, 2 longbows with 40 arrows, other treasure)

pard.description: This brightly-colored feline blur resembles a cheetah with longer fur and lynx-like ears, and seems to scorch the air as it moves.

formian warrior.description: Armored from head to toe in gleaming black-and-red chitin, this insectile warrior's tail ends in a wickedly barbed stinger.

rat king.description: Squeaks and chittering cries rise from a tangle of diseased rats with their tails knotted together.

mihstu.description: A miasmal form roils as barbed tentacles emerge from the central mass, coalescing into razor-sharp talons and claws.

nosoi.description: This strange black bird wears a leather long-nosed mask like a plague doctor.

valkyrie.description: Surrounded by lightning, this impressive female warrior wears a gleaming golden breastplate and carries a shining spear.

budget.name: valkyrie
budget.treasure: triple (+2 breastplate, +2 returning spear, other treasure)

clockwork spy.description: This tiny steel creature has one oversized eye, a spherical body, and several spider-like legs of grinding metal.

derhii.description: Powerful black wings beat from the back of this large ape, which carries a wickedly curved sword in its simian hands.

horned devil.description: Bristling with terrible spines and a crown of deadly horns, this leering winged terror wields a whirling barbed chain.

budget.name: horned devil
budget.treasure: standard (+1 unholy spiked chain, other treasure)

upasunda.description: This six-armed woman has three fanged faces on her head. She wears colorful robes, and her hands wield several exotic weapons.

budget.name: upasunda
budget.treasure: standard (weapons listed above plus other treasure)

revenant.description: This shambling corpse is twisted and mutilated. Fingers of sharpened bone reach out with malevolent intent.

vrock.description: A cloud of spores and a trail of feathers surrounds this twisted cross between a man and a gigantic vulture.

lamia matriarch.description: This creature looks like a beautiful human woman from the waist up, but below is the body and tail of an immense snake.

leucrotta.description: This freakish beast has the head of a badger, the hooves of a stag, and a wide mouth with sharp ridges of bone instead of teeth.

udaeus.description: This armored humanoid has skin resembling white bone, carved with images of weapons and dragons.

budget.name: udaeus
budget.treasure: NPC gear (mwk shortspear, mwk breastplate, mwk heavy steel shield, 4 javelins, other treasure)

cloaker.description: This ray-like creature opens a toothy maw and leers with glaring red eyes. Behind it whips a menacing tail of segmented bone.

svirfneblin.description: This bald gnome has rocky gray skin and a wiry physique. Its pale eyes are overly large and expressive.

budget.name: svirfneblin
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (heavy pick, light crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

host devil.description: Twisted horns rise from the skinless head of this winged creature, and noxious fumes leak from between its yellowed fangs.

hodag.description: Spikes cover the body of this vaguely reptilian creature. Its fearsome face features dagger-sharp teeth and glowing red eyes.

fjord linnorm.description: This massive, eel-like dragon has two webbed talons. Its tail ends in large and powerful-looking flukes.

wereboar.description: This potbellied creature has the body of a man and the head of a crazed boar. Large tusks jut from his upper jaw.

budget.name: wereboar
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather armor, 2 daggers, other treasure)

adult red dragon.description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

nagaji.description: This dark-scaled reptilian humanoid has lidless eyes, and a serpentine tongue that flickers from a fanged, lipless mouth.

budget.name: nagaji
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, longbow with 20 arrows, naginata, other treasure)

star archon.description: This powerful humanoid floats in the air on a nimbus of pearly light. He grips a golden starknife in one hand.

budget.name: star archon
budget.treasure: double (full plate, heavy steel shield, +5 holy starknife)

vouivre.description: One half of this creature is a nude woman, and the other is the front end of a slithering, winged dragon.

thriae seer.description: Lithe and beautiful, this half-bee, half-woman creature wears elaborate makeup and wields an ornate staff.

budget.name: thriae seer
budget.treasure: double (+2 quarterstaff, 3 doses of merope, other treasure)

ostiarius.description: Cloaked in shadows, every curve and sculpted muscle of this creature suggests some new gasping pleasure or titillating torture.

grig.description: Perched on the prickly legs of a cricket, this tiny creature has gossamer wings and the upper body of an elven woman.

budget.name: grig
budget.treasure: NPC gear (short sword, longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

winterwight.description: Human-sized and of a deathly blue color, this long-taloned skeletal creature is partially encased in jagged sheets of ice.

crag linnorm.description: This immense, wingless dragon rears up on a serpentine body. Its triple tail and powerful talons swipe at the air.

tikbalang.description: Merging the features of a horse and human, this monstrosity has an equine snout, sharp fangs, and long forelimbs with clawed fingers.

dire lion.description: This immense spotted lion stands as tall as a man at the shoulder, its fur matted with the blood of its victims.

ash giant.description: Towering above a typical human, this misshapen giant's pale flesh is covered in purulent sores and bulbous tumors.

budget.name: ash giant
budget.treasure: standard (hide armor, Huge club, other treasure)

bone devil.description: Merging the most horrifying features of carrion-fed insect and withered cadaver, this bony devil moves in unsettling lurches.

marsh giant.description: Cold, black eyes stare out from the fish-like face of this hideous green-skinned, web-fingered, and obese giant.

purrodaemon.description: Dozens of weapons pierce this massive monster's body. Red eyes glow with wickedness in its vulture-like head.

lizardfolk.description: This reptilian humanoid has green scales, a short and toothy snout, and a thick alligator-like tail.

budget.name: lizardfolk
budget.treasure: NPC gear (heavy wooden shield, morningstar, 3 javelins)

giant water strider.description: This bug has long, fuzzy legs that support it on the water's surface as if the creature stands on solid ground.

chernobue.description: This slippery, writhing mass of tentacles and stalked mouths has one huge hideous eye and a fanged maw for a belly.

jinkin.description: Grimacing like a maniac, this lean little bat-eared horror displays a mouth full of needle-like teeth and glowing, orange eyes.

vanara.description: This lean, simian humanoid is covered in a layer of soft, lightly colored fur and has a long, prehensile tail.

dire bat.description: This giant, furry bat is nearly the size of an ox, with dark leathery wings that open wider than two men with arms outstretched.

hobgoblin.description: Standing as tall as a human, this muscular, gray-skinned creature peers about with tiny, observant eyes.

budget.name: hobgoblin
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (studded leather armor, light steel shield, longsword, longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

baregara.description: This lumbering apelike monster has blood-red fur, twisted horns, and a hideous fanged orifice set in the center of its chest.

schir.description: This goat-headed humanoid is covered in a mangy gray hide that only partly covers its gaunt but muscled frame.

hamadryad.description: This regal woman exhibits the grace and pride of the forest's most ancient trees.

budget.name: hamadryad
budget.treasure: triple (+2 speed composite longbow [+5] with 20 arrows, masterwork dagger, other treasure)

ancient sea dragon.description: The long, undulating body of this serpentine dragon rolls and bends with scales the color of the ocean's waves.

lunar naga.description: Stark white hair frames the fair face of this snake-bodied woman, and its black scales sparkle hypnotically.

sepid.description: Twice the height of a human, this horned monstrous warrior wields a massive blade.

rust monster.description: This insectile monster has four legs, a strange propeller-shaped protrusion at the end of its tail, and two long, feathery antennae.

young crystal dragon.description: This brilliantly colored dragon has scales, teeth, and claws made of multicolored crystal, and its wings are sheets of flexible glass.

jiang-shi.description: Its flesh pallid and a parchment burial prayer hanging from its brow, this risen corpse lurches forward in a series of short hops.

budget.name: jiang-shi
budget.treasure: NPC gear (amulet of natural armor +1, cloak of resistance +1, potion of invisibility, alchemist's fire [6])

frost drake.description: This two-legged dragon has dull blue scales tinged with bright blue ice. A freezing mist issues from between its powerful jaws.

berbalang.description: This hunched, bat-winged horror moves with an uncanny grace, its glowing eyes and long tongue presenting a frightening visage.

fungal nymph.description: Mushroom caps and mold sprout from the pallid skin of this lithe female figure, and spores waft from her fungal gills.

ogre mage.description: Clad in beautiful armor, this exotically garbed giant roars, its tusks glistening and its eyes afire with murderous intent.

budget.name: ogre mage
budget.treasure: double (chain shirt, greatsword, composite longbow [+7 Str] with 20 arrows, other treasure)

monaciello.description: Dressed in red robes like those of a monk, this little monster displays a sharp-toothed smile and flips a gold coin in its hand.

ice devil.description: A pair of frozen, multifaceted eyes coldly judge all before this towering, insectile monstrosity.

night hag.description: Grisly fetishes and the rags of once fine clothes hang off the corpse-thin frame of this horrifying, sharp-fanged crone.

sea bonze.description: Massive and blacker than the darkest depths of the sea, this colossal watery form glares with two immense, hate-filled eyes.

azruverda.description: A humanoid head peers forth from this enormous creature's beautifully iridescent, spike-covered beetle carapace.

formian taskmaster.description: This centaurlike creature is equipped with an ant's mandibles and antennae.

charybdis.description: An immense spiny monster, its back plated in chitin and its belly in thick folds of blubber, rises hungrily from the center of a whirlpool.

intellect devourer.description: Devoid of a head, or any features at all save for four short, clawed legs, this creature's body looks like a large, glistening brain.

vemerak.description: This huge monstrosity seems like some alien, clawed insect, with vaguely humanoid features and three tentacular tails.

tunche.description: Standing on three legs, this creature is a mix of dangerous jungle animals and plants fused into one deadly predator.

dorvae.description: Two pairs of stretched and veiny leather wings adorn the back of this shrouded reptilian nightmare.

ettercap.description: This hideous purple creature walks upright like a man, but its face is that of a spider, and its hands are sickle-shaped claws.

magmin.description: Built of fire and magma, this short humanoid radiates intense heat that causes the air around it to shimmer.

rokurokubi.description: This peasant woman sprouts a grotesquely long neck that coils about like a snake, with razor-sharp teeth filling her gaping maw.

juvenile rukh.description: This gigantic two-headed vulture has greasy, night-black wings and sharp talons.

sea drake.description: Not quite sea serpent or dragon, this vicious beast is covered with shiny blue-green scales. Its arms serve as both wings and flippers.

serpentfolk.description: This serpentine humanoid has bright scaly skin, a long sinuous tail, and a fanged serpent's head.

pixie.description: This tiny, whimsical-looking humanoid darts about swiftly on wildly colored gossamer wings.

sceaduinar.description: This gargoyle-like creature has long spiky legs and a bat-like head—its body seems to be made of living, dark purple crystal.

tiefling.description: This lanky man sneers as he draws his sword. Tiny horns and a barbed tail reveal that he is something more than human.

budget.name: tiefling
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather armor, short sword, light crossbow with 20 bolts)

frost wight.description: The pale flesh of this walking corpse is rotting and putrid, its body skeletal in places, with blue-white eyes and ice in their hair.

elysian titan.description: This titanic humanoid wears gilt-edged armor of ancient make and carries an immense hammer made of gleaming metal.

budget.name: elysian titan
budget.treasure: standard (+3 breastplate, maul of the titans, other treasure)

alraune.description: An attractive green-skinned woman sits in the depths of this enormous, sweet-smelling flower.

decapus.description: This swollen cephalopod has ten writhing tentacles and a hideously monstrous face with pale, milky eyes on its bulbous body.

dryad.description: This strange, beautiful woman has flesh that seems made of wood and vibrant hair that resembles leaves and blossoms.

budget.name: dryad
budget.treasure: standard (dagger, masterwork longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

adult crystal dragon.description: This brilliantly colored dragon has scales, teeth, and claws made of multicolored crystal, and its wings are sheets of flexible glass.

will-o'-wisp.description: This faintly glowing ball of light bobs gently in the air, the nebulous image of what might be a skull visible somewhere in its depths.

buggane.description: This hairless, hunchbacked giant has cruel tusks and two enormous, blunt-clawed fists that look strong enough to shatter stone.

wyrwood.description: Though obviously a wooden construct, this small, nimble creature moves fluidly and purposefully.

budget.name: wyrwood
budget.treasure: NPC gear (daggers [2], leather armor, thieves' tools, other treasure)

purple worm.description: This enormous worm is covered with dark purple plates of chitinous armor. Its giant, tooth-filled mouth is the size of an ox.

balor.description: This winged fiend's horned head and fanged visage present the perfection of the demonic form, fire spurting from its flesh.

budget.name: balor
budget.treasure: standard (+1 unholy longsword, +1 flaming whip, other treasure)

sahuagin.description: This scaly humanoid has a long, fish-like tail. Its arms and legs end in webbed claws, and its piscine head features a toothy maw.

budget.name: sahuagin
budget.treasure: NPC gear (trident, heavy crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

graveknight.description: Shadows veil what lurks within the dark, imposing armor of this figure, though two piercing eyes gaze from its closed visor.

budget.name: graveknight
budget.treasure: NPC gear (+1 full plate, +1 greatsword, composite longbow [+8 Str] with 20 arrows, belt of giant strength +2, other treasure)

freshwater merrow.description: This giant has pale green, scaled skin and large, webbed hands and feet. On either side of its neck are slotted gills.

giant dragonfly nymph.description: This glittering blue dragonfly is about the size of a horse and is large enough to carry off small farm animals or people.

jorogumo.description: Eight spindly spider legs, flocked with coarse black hairs, stretch from the back of this otherwise beautiful black-haired woman.

adult void dragon.description: This dragon's ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substancethat glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starrysky.

faun.description: This capricious figure has the upper torso, arms, and head of a man, but goatlike legs, a tail, and curling horns on his head.

budget.name: faun
budget.treasure: standard (dagger, shortbow with 20 arrows, masterwork panpipes, other treasure)

charda.description: Armored in dense, bony plates, this four-armed creature drools wretched strings of black bile from its fanged maw.

imentesh.description: This serpentine creature has the lower body of a snake, a humanoid torso, and a bird-like head and claws.

treant.description: This animated tree's bark is knotted into vaguely humanoid features, with branches for arms and roots for legs.

hekatonkheires.description: This behemoth looks like a towering humanoid with fifty heads and twice as many hands, each wielding a different weapon.

winter hag.description: This woman has black, frostbitten skin, white hair, and a black ice staff decorated with bones and gems.

worm that walks.description: Although this robed wizard stands and moves like a man, his body is a writhing mass of squirming, slippery worms.

budget.name: worm that walks
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (+4 leather armor, cloak of resistance +4, staff of charming)

allosaurus.description: This bipedal dinosaur has a mouth filled with sharp teeth and short, powerful arms that end in sharp claws.

wikkawak.description: This thick-bodied, white-furred bugbear wears bearskins and carries an axe made of ice and bone.

budget.name: wikkawak
budget.treasure: NPC gear (mwk studded leather armor, battleaxe, 3 javelins, other treasure)

nycar.description: This cruel-looking serpent is about the size of a housecat, with two forearms and dangerous-looking fangs.

lampad.description: Tears stream from this beautiful but sullen creature's eyes, forming a puddle beneath her delicate feet.

budget.name: lampad
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork dagger, masterwork sling, other treasure)

flame drake.description: This ferocious creature looks like a red-and-yellow scaled dragon, but with only two legs.

deep sea serpent.description: This enormous, water-dwelling serpent has bright, bulging eyes and rounded jaws filled with long, jagged teeth.

thanadaemon.description: Rattling with each stride, this looming, horned, skeletal figure clutches a wicked staff. A seething glow burns in its eye sockets.

chuul.description: This lobster-like creature has a thick armored shell. A pair of tiny eyes gleams above a mouth full of writhing tentacles.

ghawwas.description: Bristling with spiny ridges, coral horns, and needle-sharp teeth, this menacing biped seems to have emerged from some poisoned sea.

badger.description: The squat, waddling badger trudges forth. Thrusting its flattened nose about the ground, it sniffs incessantly.

denizen of leng.description: Shrouded in tattered leather robes, this strange humanoid looks more alien and horrific the more one studies its twitching visage.

budget.name: denizen of leng
budget.treasure: double (500 to 2,000 gp in rubies, other treasure)

goblin snake.description: A gray, lipless goblin head with serpent's fangs sits atop the sinuous black body of this greasy-scaled snake.

shedu.description: This noble creature stands strong and tall with the body of a powerful bull and the head of a wise-looking human.

scylla.description: This horrifying creature has the upper body of a beautiful woman, but a lower body of snapping wolf heads and writhing tentacles.

viper vine.description: Large tendrils ending in tiny claws unfurl from the central stalk of this plant, which rises like a serpent ready to strike.

wyvaran.description: This dragonlike humanoid brandishes its spear, spreads its wings, and shows its fangs in a angry snarl.

budget.name: wyvaran
budget.treasure: NPC gear (spear, scale mail, holy symbol, other treasure)

young white dragon.description: This dragon's scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

young red dragon.description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

mercane.description: The tall, blue-skinned humanoid is clad in loose, flowing robes. Its alien face has too many eyes and its hands have too few fingers.

witchfire.description: Bathed in sickly green flames, this insubstantial specter of a beautiful young woman floats just off the ground.

scrag.description: This tall creature has rough, green hide. Its hands end in claws, and its bestial face has a hideous, tusked underbite.

ancient sovereign dragon.description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

shredskin.description: This floating creature looks like an orc's animate, hollow skin. Its upper half is intact, but its lower half is in tatters.

bebilith.description: A spider the size of an elephant, this dark blue arachnid rears up on its six hind legs to raise its barbed and razor-edged front claws.

adult black dragon.description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

maharaja.description: Impeccably dressed and bedecked in exotic jewelry, this fiend holds an ornate saber in its backward-facing hands.

aasimar.description: This supernaturally beautiful woman looks human, yet emanates a strange sense of calm and benevolence.

budget.name: aasimar
budget.treasure: NPC gear (scale mail, heavy mace, light crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

dandasuka.description: This small creature looks like a well-dressed and jewelry-bedecked fiendish gnome, its face mostly mouth and fangs.

ratfolk.description: This small, ratlike humanoid has a twitching, whiskered snout, pointed ears, and a long, leathery tail.

budget.name: ratfolk
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, light crossbow with 20 bolts, dagger, other treasure)

storm giant.description: This giant is a towering, muscular human of heroic proportions, with bronze skin, dark hair, and sparkling green eyes.

budget.name: storm giant
budget.treasure: standard (mwk breastplate, mwk composite longbow [+14 Str bonus] with 20 arrows, mwk greatsword, other treasure)

ancient lunar dragon.description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon's spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

graeae.description: Haggard and hunched, this blind and snaggletoothed crone guides herself by a gruesomely bloated eyeball she clutches in her claws.

young silver dragon.description: The scales of this tall, elegant dragon shine like polished silver, and its tail has a feathered appearance.

kraken.description: This tremendous leviathan resembles a vast squid, yet the markings on its body are strangely unsettling to look upon.

tanuki.description: Short and pudgy, this raccoonlike humanoid wields a stout quarterstaff and weaves a little as if intoxicated.

budget.name: tanuki
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork quarterstaff, 4 gulps of sake in a gourd, other treasure)

adlet.description: This humanoid wolf's fur is snowy white and its eyes piercing blue; it grips an ornate spear in its fist.

hill giant.description: This hunched giant exudes power and a crude, stupid anger, its filthy fur clothing bespeaking a brutish and backwoods lifestyle.

adult bronze dragon.description: This sleek dragon is covered in dull metallic scales that range in color from shining bronze to mottled blue.

adult magma dragon.description: Between this dragons jet-black scales run glowing rivulets of lava, and veins aglow with heat shine in the membranes of its wings.

wood giant.description: Standing tall and graceful, this sharp-eared giant's skin is pale. Its large brow gives it a somewhat primitive visage.

budget.name: wood giant
budget.treasure: standard (leather armor, longsword, masterwork composite longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

marai.description: This finely robed and nimble fiend has six colorful vipers in place of arms, and a long, forked tongue in its fanged mouth.

ancient gold dragon.description: Golden scales cover the body of this majestic dragon, and a regal crest of horns arches backward above wise and piercing eyes.

imp.description: Fiendish wings and a whipping scorpion-like tail lash behind this diminutive, red-skinned nuisance.

drowning devil.description: This serpentine creature has finlike wings, ram horns, four eyes, and arms that end in masses of tentacles.

otyugh.description: This three-legged freak is mostly mouth. Three tentacles, two tipped with barbs and one with eyes, extend from its sides.

catfolk.description: This lithe, catlike humanoid has a long tail and pointed ears. Her feline eyes sparkle with curiosity and mischief.

budget.name: catfolk
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather armor, longbow with 20 arrows, longsword, other treasure)

ogre spider.description: This towering spider is the size of an elephant. Its legs have spiky joints and its face looks vaguely, but disturbingly, humanoid.

nalfeshnee.description: A towering, corpulent beast, this fiend has the hideous head of a boar and arms ending in fatty, four-fingered hands.

zomok.description: At first glance, this creature resembles a dragon, but its body is entirely made of plants and soil, and it exhales clouds of dirt.

ancient copper dragon.description: Bright, shining copper scales run from the horn-crowned head to the ridged tail of this long-winged dragon.

wight.description: The flesh of this walking corpse is rotting and putrid, its body skeletal in places and its eye sockets glowing with red light.

soulbound shell.description: This white statue of a bald human is marbled with glowing green veins of energy.

penanggalen.description: A pale face framed by glossy black hair hangs in the air, trailing viscera from the ragged stump of its neck like a grisly tail.

shriezyx.description: An oversized, eight-legged monstrosity stares ravenously from its three beady eyes, its gaping maw dripping with green venom.

aranea.description: This bloated spider has a hunchbacked body and a gleam of intelligence in its multiple eyes.

ancient time dragon.description: This dragon's cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

bugbear.description: This dark-furred creature raises a spiked morningstar, its tiny, milk-white eyes glittering with the thrill of the coming kill.

budget.name: bugbear
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, light wooden shield, morningstar, 3 javelins, other treasure)

cythnigot.description: This six-legged horror has a spider's face and a fibrous stalk growing out of its back—a stalk ending in a snapping mouth.

skeletal champion.description: This armored skeleton stands in a battle-ready pose, its weapon held high as cold blue light shines in its eye sockets.

budget.name: skeletal champion
budget.treasure: standard (breastplate, heavy steel shield, masterwork longsword, other treasure)

ifrit.description: This muscular, fiery-skinned man has flaming hair and spotted horns upon his brow.

twigjack.description: This tiny, vaguely humanoid creature seems to be made completely of bundles of sticks wound with thorny vines.

forest drake.description: This green-scaled dragon has two powerful legs and a pair of long, leathery wings. A long spike adorns its thrashing tail.

taotieh.description: This white marble statue resembles a large feline, but its body and face are covered in decorative etchings and runes.

lich.description: Once fine robes hang in tatters from this withered corpse's frame. A pale blue light shines from where its eyes should be.

budget.name: lich
budget.treasure: NPC gear (boots of levitation, headband of vast intelligence +2 [Perception], ring of protection +2, potion of invisibility, scroll of dominate person, scroll of teleport)

allip.description: This malignant cloud of shadows boils in the air, its skeletal maw eerily babbling as the creature's claws manifest from the darkness.

ghost.description: This spectral, horrifying figure glides silently through the air, passing through solid objects as if they didn't exist.

nosferatu.description: This somberly dressed but feral-looking gaunt man has yellowed, ratlike fangs and ragged, clawed fingers.

budget.name: nosferatu
budget.treasure: NPC gear (wand of scorching ray [10 charges], +2 leather armor, belt of incredible dexterity +2, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, other treasure)

griffon.description: This majestic beast has the body of a lion, the head and forelegs of a great eagle, and a massive pair of feathered wings.

simurgh.description: This massive creature has the body of a resplendent bird but the head of a regal canine.

catrina.description: With lengthy curling hair, a dancer's dress, and a bouquet of flowers, this woman remains beautiful, despite having no flesh.

adult blue dragon.description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

aghash.description: Draped in rags and hunched over on goatlike legs, this creature possesses a featureless face, save for a large eye ringed by fangs.

yamaraj.description: The head of this winged, dragonlike beast is crowned with long spines. Sooty feathers cover its body.

young blue dragon.description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

young copper dragon.description: Bright, shining copper scales run from the horn-crowned head to the ridged tail of this long-winged dragon.

sard.description: This wriggling and leafless tree moves on spidery legs. Flickering motes of blood-red lightning dance in the cracks of its bark.

behir.description: This slithering, multilegged blue reptile has a fearsome head crowned with two large, curling horns.

incutilis.description: This strange nautilus drags itself forward on oversized tentacles, its crimson-streaked flesh textured like the surface a brain.

ancient bronze dragon.description: This sleek dragon is covered in dull metallic scales that range in color from shining bronze to mottled blue.

adult lunar dragon.description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon's spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

adult brass dragon.description: A crest of horns sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a long neck and serpentine brass body.

shadow drake.description: This tiny black dragonlike creature has charcoal-colored scales and shadowy wings.

rukh.description: This gigantic two-headed vulture has greasy, night-black wings and sharp talons.

shield archon.description: This armored giant is sheathed in metal from head to toe. One arm ends in a spear-like blade, the other in a massive shield.

orc.description: This savage creature looks like a bestial version of a savage human, with green-gray skin and greasy black hair.

budget.name: orc
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather armor, falchion, 4 javelins, other treasure)

sinspawn.description: This hairless humanoid lurches on back-bent, dog-like legs, its hideous mouth flanked by tiny arms with three-fingered hands.

choker.description: This hunched-over wretch has long, pliable arms like tentacles capped with five wide, spiny claws.

baykok.description: This howling corpse swoops through the air with hideously elongated legs and a bow made of bone.

budget.name: baykok
budget.treasure: standard (+1 composite longbow [+3 Str], other treasure)

stone giant.description: This giant has chiseled, muscular features and a flat, forward-sloping head, looking almost as if it were carved of stone.

androsphinx.description: This regal, bird-winged lion has a human's head, clad in the golden raiment of a powerful pharaoh.

young brine dragon.description: A blue-green neck frill sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a body of shiny scales and fin-like crests.

young time dragon.description: This dragon's cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

violet fungus.description: This mushroom grows from a bed of tentacular roots. Deep violet tendrils slither out of the dozens of fissures in its pointed cap.

young sky dragon.description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

kitsune.description: This elegantly dressed woman has the head and bushy tail of well-groomed fox.

budget.name: kitsune
budget.treasure: NPC gear (potion of cure light wounds, mwk quarterstaff, other treasure)

gashadokuro.description: The bones and skulls of countless smaller creatures dribble from the joints and rib cage of this massive skeleton.

brijidine.description: This beautiful woman has flesh made of lava. She soars through the sky on a trail of fire.

stymphalidies.description: This towering, ibis-like bird appears to be sculpted from silver and brass, yet it moves with the fluidity of a living creature.

gearghost.description: Grasping arms emerge from a tangled cluster of debris and mechanical parts. A metal skull hovers above the clanging mess.

taniniver.description: This legless, winged, white-eyed dragon is covered in patches of diseased flesh, squirming with maggots and oozing pus.

boggard.description: Bulbous eyes glare atop this creature's decidedly toad-like head. A multitude of warts and bumps decorate its greenish skin.

budget.name: boggard
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, morningstar, other treasure)

adult silver dragon.description: The scales of this tall, elegant dragon shine like polished silver, and its tail has a feathered appearance.

ningyo.description: This dog-sized creature combines the upper half of a deformed monkey with the lower half of a thrashing fish.

thriae soldier.description: This creature has the upper body of a woman and the lower body of a bee. She wields a longbow with uncanny skill.

budget.name: thriae soldier
budget.treasure: standard (chain shirt, composite longbow [+5 Str] with 20 arrows, 1 dose of merope, other treasure)

spirit oni.description: This evil-looking animated mask shows the face of a horned fiend, its eyes popping and its leering smile full of fangs.

fomorian titan.description: This godlike giant wears armor made of thick plates of blackened iron and wields a great bladed mace.

budget.name: fomorian titan
budget.treasure: double (+3 speed wounding heavy mace, +4 moderate fortification full plate, other treasure)

giant black widow spider.description: This long-legged spider has a huge, glossy black abdomen, marked on the underside with the shape of a crimson hourglass.

jinushigami.description: This enormous amalgamation of stone and plant matter takes the shape of an old man leaning on an equally huge staff.

mothman.description: A shroud of dark wings cloaks this thin, humanoid shape. Two monstrous red eyes glare malevolently from its narrow face.

cliff giant.description: This giant has a majestic presence and stoic bearing. His rocky, red-brown skin is shot through with streaks of shimmering color.

iku-turso.description: This grotesque, emerald-scaled creature resembles a crossbreed of an eel, a viperfish, and a clawed humanoid.

crysmal.description: An animated cluster of translucent crystals shaped disturbingly like a gemstone scorpion scuttles into an aggressive stance.

tiberolith.description: A bizarre thrum echoes from somewhere deep within this towering stone hulk, and blue liquid runs down its shuddering body.

harionago.description: This deathly pale beauty's skin is blemished with bruises and cuts, yet a smile shows behind her flowing tangle of hair.

unfettered eidolon.description: This bizarre amalgam of monstrous parts rampages forth, an eldritch rune seared upon its forehead.

trumpet archon.description: Lithe and beautiful, with skin the color of marble, this being hovers upon powerful, white wings and radiates a sense of serenity.

derghodaemon.description: A deadly and vicious bouquet of insectile claws sprouts from this horrid, three-legged, multi-eyed beast.

planetar.description: Muscular, bald, and tall, this humanoid creature has emerald skin and two pairs of shining, white-feathered wings.

vrolikai.description: This black-skinned, bat-winged demon has four arms; a long, thin tail; and a leering, fanged face with dead, white eyes.

ghul.description: Draped in fine dark robes, this undead creature's body seems to be made of equal parts bone, leathery flesh, and blood-red smoke.

gray render.description: This hulking beast has slick, gray, hairless skin. Its numerous yellow eyes and wide toothy maw are its only facial features.

cold rider.description: Jagged, twisting antlers of dark blue ice crown the helm of this ice-armored humanoid figure.

festrog.description: This hideously malformed, hairless, pustule-covered corpse moves and snarls more like an undead hound than an undead man.

yrthak.description: This flying reptile has large, leathery wings and a vibrantly colored crest on its horned, narrow-snouted head.

maftet.description: Broad hawk wings support this creature with the torso of a bronze-skinned human and the lower body of a tawny, bipedal lion.

kasatha.description: This strange, four-armed humanoid is sleek and muscled, with two spiked blades raised to strike.

dire badger.description: A tremendous badger snarls and scrapes its wicked, shovel-like claws. Stocky muscles ripple beneath its streaked and shaggy fur.

star-spawn of cthulhu.description: A mountainous form, this hideous creature is humanoid in general shape, but its hateful face is a writhing mass of tentacles.

gourd leshy.description: This little plant man walks on legs like tangled vines and has a pumpkin carved with eyes and a mouth for a head.

nymph water strider.description: These small, immature water insects are easily supported by the water's surface tension.

triton.description: This scaly, finned humanoid has an athletic build and blue-green coloration. Its legs end in wide flippers rather than feet.

budget.name: triton
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork trident, heavy crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

wyvern.description: A dark blue dragon, its wings immense and its tail tipped with a hooked stinger, lands on two taloned feet and roars a challenge.

living wall.description: This gruesome wall is made stacked corpses mortared together into an unyielding mass of grasping limbs, topped with a dragon skull.

omox.description: This rancid-smelling mound of animated ooze has about its shifting countenance the hideous shape of a half-melted man.

glabrezu.description: Four arms grace the torso of this towering monstrosity. The monster's eyes shine with a mix of intelligence and cruelty.

young umbral dragon.description: This sleek, dark dragon moves with a disturbing, serpentine grace, its eyes glowing as if lit from within by crimson embers.

geist.description: This disembodied phantom wears black robes that swirl around a maw of sharp teeth.

humbaba.description: This towering, horned, lion-faced giant has long, braided hair and is outfitted in various pieces of plate armor.

giant weasel.description: The predatory nature of this wolf-sized creature is revealed by its long teeth, sleekly muscular body, and belligerent hiss.

adult copper dragon.description: Bright, shining copper scales run from the horn-crowned head to the ridged tail of this long-winged dragon.

banshee.description: This beautiful, ghostly elven woman glides through the air, her long hair flowing around a face knotted into a mask of rage.

glacier toad.description: This improbably large toad has pale blue flesh and a body covered with jagged, icy growths.

hezrou.description: This fiend's armored flesh is scaly and moist. Its large, toothy mouth gapes below a pair of hungry, reptilian eyes.

weretiger.description: This humanoid tiger has striped fur and a muscular, lanky frame. Its feline face has sharp fangs and slitted eyes.

budget.name: weretiger
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather, masterwork short sword, 2 masterwork daggers, other treasure)

giant queen bee.description: This giant bee is as large as a horse and unusually fat, with light brown stripes on her body.

river drake.description: With graceful wings and wide fins, this sleek dragon looks equally well equipped to glide through sea and sky.

dhampir.description: This unnaturally graceful man moves without a sound, his gaze just as piercing as the needle-sharp blade he effortlessly wields.

budget.name: dhampir
budget.treasure: NPC gear (chain shirt, rapier, other treasure)

adult white dragon.description: This dragon's scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

bandersnatch.description: This six-limbed beast stalks forward with a fluid grace. Barbed quills run along its back, and its eyes glow with a blue light.

warsworn.description: An enormous, animate mass of armed and armored corpses undulates forth, like a siege tower of steel-girded flesh.

lurker in light.description: This large-eyed humanoid looks like a glowing, emaciated elven child save for its small, transparent wings.

erinyes devil.description: Some calamity has befallen this angelic warrior. Wings stained black shear the air as her merciless eyes search for a target.

budget.name: erinyes devil
budget.treasure: triple (+1 longsword, +1 flaming composite longbow [+5 Str bonus], rope)

attic whisperer.description: This thing resembles a gray, emaciated child, with cobwebs and dust for clothes and a fox skull for a head.

minotaur.description: With the body of a powerfully built man and the head of a snarling bull, this creature stomps its hooves as if preparing to charge.

ancient vortex dragon.description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

giant crab spider.description: This pale yellow spider's legs protrude on either side, giving it a very distinctive stance. The thing is the size of a large dog.

norn.description: This towering, stern woman wears her long blonde hair in braids. She carries a reel of golden thread and a pair of shears.

budget.name: norn
budget.treasure: double (+3 hide armor, shears, golden thread worth 500 gp, other treasure)

fetchling.description: This gaunt man appears drained of color, like a person viewed at twilight or in a dark alley.

budget.name: fetchling
budget.treasure: NPC gear (chain shirt, dagger, other treasure)

avoral.description: Great feathers sweep back from this fierce bird-man's brow, and long, clawed hands grow from the end of his wings.

myceloid.description: This shambling fungus creature bears a strong resemblance to a  rotund human, but with a mushroom cap for a head.

sargassum fiend.description: This shifting mass of green seaweed transforms from the shape of a humanoid back to a patch of algae, continually changing.

budget.name: sargassum fiend
budget.treasure: incidental (1d6 sargassum fiend bulbs, other treasure)

ancient sky dragon.description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

hellcat.description: This eerie beast appears to be the animated skeleton of a huge fanged cat, its bones glowing with fire and seething with smoke.

janni.description: This regal figure looks like a tall, well-proportioned human, save that its eyes sparkle with strange light.

budget.name: janni
budget.treasure: standard (chainmail, composite longbow [+3 Str], scimitar, other gear)

cecaelia.description: In place of legs, this handsome humanoid sports an octopus's eight writhing tentacles.

kappa.description: This humanoid turtle crouches near the water, a suspicious look in its eyes. The top of its bowl-shaped head is filled with water.

nymph.description: A delicate figure rises from the water, her long ears tapering to points above her head, her beauty painful in its perfection.

zoog.description: This skittish amalgam of beast parts has luminous eyes, a rat's tail, simian appendages, and tendrils extending from a mole-like nose

ancient forest dragon.description: This massive serpentine and wingless creature has jade scales and antlers, and sounds like grinding stones as it stalks forth.

troll.description: This tall creature has rough, green hide. Its hands end in claws, and its bestial face has a hideous, tusked underbite.

elohim.description: This one-eyed being is a strange mix of insects, fungi, and other living things shaped into a single winged entity.

drakainia.description: This woman's upper body is shapely and beautiful, but her lower body is bloated, with pulsating tumors and writing tentacles.

grick.description: This pallid, slimy, worm-like creature is the size of a human, its mouth a sickening tangle of tentacles and hooked jaws.

moonflower.description: A twisted trunk clustered with bulbous blossoms holds up a gaping mouth ready to swallow a victim whole.

dark naga.description: A sharp-featured humanoid head crowns the powerful, sinuous body of this snake-like monstrosity.

chaneque.description: This creature appears to be a cross between a pixie and a bat with charred flesh. Around its waist dangle tiny fairy skull trophies.

svartalfar.description: This hairless, black-skinned elflike creature has an expressionless face and wields an eerie ebon sword.

giant octopus.description: A storm of tentacles, each twenty feet in length, flails with deadly precision from the leathery body of this gigantic octopus.

akvan.description: Ornate armor covers this hulking creature, rocky protrusions jutting from its hide and fierce horns crowning its broad head.

slag giant.description: Soot, ash, and coal dust streak this giant's rust-colored skin. Her eyes hold a look of both determination and detachment.

olethrodaemon.description: Crowned with a wicked array of twisted horns, this wide-mouthed, spherical behemoth stands on four stout legs.

dark slayer.description: This small humanoid is clothed in tattered rags from head to foot. Only its sinister eyes and pale hands are visible.

budget.name: dark slayer
budget.treasure: standard (kukri, black smear [2 doses] [see Bestiary 54], other gear)

frost giant.description: This giant looks like a thick, muscular human. It has frost-white skin and long, light blue hair that it wears braided.

samsaran.description: This serene-looking slender young man has pale blue skin and solid black eyes, and is dressed in simple robes.

budget.name: samsaran
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather, spear, sling with 10 bullets, thieves' tools, other treasure)

kobold.description: This short, reptilian humanoid has scaled skin, a snout filled with tiny teeth, and a long tail.

budget.name: kobold
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, spear, sling, other treasure)

couatl.description: This great serpent has multicolored wings and eyes that glimmer with intense awareness.

adhukait.description: A pair of spiked fiends, interwoven through bodily cavities and impaling limbs, spin in a dance with their twin curved knives.

siren.description: This creature has the body of a hawk and the head of a beautiful woman with long, shining hair.

tatzlwyrm.description: This serpentine creature has the head of a ferocious dragon and two relatively small forearms that end in tiny claws.

adult time dragon.description: This dragon's cracked scales creak with frightening, patient power. Some of its horns are ancient and brittle, others new and pristine.

formian myrmarch.description: This horse-sized insect has a brilliant red carapace, and its monstrous face reflects great intelligence and confidence.

contract devil.description: With rust-colored skin and a jutting crown of ridge-like horns, this muscular devil is draped in lengthy contracts.

green hag.description: Knots of dark, moldering hair spill over the features of this sickly, thin, green-skinned crone.

fungus leshy.description: Mismatched eyes dot this plant creature's thick mushroom cap, while below works an overlarge maw set with pale fungal teeth.

ancient red dragon.description: A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.

leukodaemon.description: This human-shaped beast has a horse's skull for a head. It walks on cracked hooves and bears the rotting wings of a carrion bird.

wayang.description: Spiralling patterns cover this shadowy humanoid's skin, and its black hair trails away in wisps.

budget.name: wayang
budget.treasure: NPC gear (blowgun with 20 darts, dagger, other treasure)

hieracosphinx.description: A cold-eyed falcon's head and great wings adorn the body of this otherwise leonine creature.

siyokoy.description: This eel-like creature sports sharp frills that run along the back of humanoid torso and down its long, powerful tail.

seps.description: This giant armored snake has large fangs, dripping with venom that hisses when it spatters on the ground.

soulbound doll.description: This doll's glass eyes glisten with unmistakable curiosity as it comes to life with a fluid grace.

blood hag.description: This woman would be pretty if it were not for her sharp teeth and nails, and her ghastly pale skin.

ancient black dragon.description: Hissing green acid drips from the fanged maw of this black-scaled, horned dragon.

astral deva.description: This tall, human-like creature has long, feathery wings and a gentle inner radiance that makes it difficult to look directly at.

human juju zombie.description: This wretched human figure has tight leathery skin, sunken eyes, and an emaciated frame, yet it moves with eerie alacrity.

budget.name: human juju zombie
budget.treasure: NPC gear (masterwork short sword, other treasure)

nightwave.description: Immense almost beyond belief, this sleek, midnight-black shark rises from the sea like an unholy island heaved up from below.

interlocutor.description: At the core of this multi-limbed monstrosity of claws and blades struggles a glistening mass of veins, organs, and twisted flesh.

asurendra.description: This six-armed humanoid horror is garbed in golden armor and surrounded by a nimbus of floating, glowing weaponry.

red wyrm ravener.description: This immense skeletal dragon rears up to its full, towering height, bones glowing and shimmering with vile green energy.

cairn linnorm.description: Pallid and horribly gaunt, this enormous but emaciated dragonlike creature has two forearms and no wings.

coloxus.description: This figure would be the picture of elegance and refinement were it not for its grotesque fly head and shivering insectile wings.

vampire.description: This alluring, raven-haired beauty casually wipes a trickle of blood from a pale cheek, then smiles to reveal needle-sharp fangs.

budget.name: vampire
budget.treasure: NPC gear (cloak of resistance +3, headband of alluring charisma +4, ring of protection +2)

bogeyman.description: Dressed in a long dark coat and a tall hat, this lanky, fanged humanoid exudes an almost palpable aura of horror.

kuwa.description: This golden-skinned fiend has horns, fangs, and bulging eyes. It grips a spiked club in its four-fingered claws.

budget.name: kuwa
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork half-plate, masterwork greatclub, masterwork composite longbow [+4 Str] with 20 arrows, other treasure)

haniver.description: This small, bizarre humanoid creature has finlike wings, strange yellow skin, and tiny black eyes burning with malevolence.

kolyarut.description: Beneath its cloak, this man-shaped creature appears to be part statue and part metallic machine.

girtablilu.description: The body of a spear-wielding woman rises from the front of this monstrously huge scorpion.

draugr.description: This barnacle-encrusted walking corpse looks like a zombie, but is dripping with water and gives off a nauseating stench.

werewolf.description: This muscular creature has a man's body but the snarling head and fur coat of a wolf.

budget.name: werewolf
budget.treasure: NPC gear (chainmail, longsword, light crossbow with 20 bolts, other treasure)

nyogoth.description: This appears to be a mass of floating intestines tangled around a fanged mouth—the tips of its coils also end in toothy maws.

water naga.description: Slender spines and brightly colored frills stretch back from the humanlike face of this massive aquatic snake.

abaia.description: This multi-eyed eel's brightly colored markings shift in complex, ever-changing patterns.

ahuizotl.description: This bear-sized beast has a body like a squat simian, a dog's face, and a long tail that ends in a clawed hand.

undine.description: This blue-haired, blue-skinned man moves with a liquid grace. His ears are fin-like, and his hands and feet are webbed.

budget.name: undine
budget.treasure: NPC gear (scale mail, trident, other treasure)

ghaele azata.description: This elegantly armored sentinel stands alert, her eyes radiating divine light and her noble blade crackling with power.

ogre.description: This lumbering giant's beady eyes are devoid of wit or kindness, and its puffy face features a wide mouth with ill-fitting teeth.

budget.name: ogre
budget.treasure: standard (hide armor, greatclub, 4 javelins, other treasure)

centaur.description: This creature has the sun-bronzed upper body of a seasoned warrior and the lower body of a sleek warhorse.

budget.name: centaur
budget.treasure: standard (breastplate, heavy steel shield, longsword, spear, other treasure)

tylosaurus.description: Surging out of the water, this massive lizard is shaped like a giant fish with a powerful, toothed maw.

saltwater merrow.description: This giant has pale green, scaled skin and large, webbed hands and feet. On either side of its neck are slotted gills.

tor linnorm.description: This gigantic, wingless, four-armed dragon has rivulets of bright red magma coursing through its serpentine body.

dagon.description: This demon's body is a nightmare of writhing tentacles and slippery coils below the leering maw of a deep sea predator.

pipefox.description: This furry, minute serpent has a foxlike head and tiny eyes that glitter with intelligence.

cerberi.description: Every strip of this three-headed hound's hide has been peeled away, leaving wet sinew and bulging tendons exposed.

yuki-onna.description: This beautiful but sad-looking woman wears an ornate robe and is surrounded by a whirling mass of snow.

divine guardian hydra.description: This regal hydra has one larger head and four smaller ones, and projects an aura of authority and menace.

giant sea anemone.description: This giant, tubular creature ends in a mass of thick and brilliantly colored tendrils arrayed around an enormous, toothless maw.

zuishin.description: Within this elaborate suit of armor can be seen the partial form of a determined warrior.

budget.name: zuishin
budget.treasure: double (+1 composite longbow [+4 Str], +1 halberd, masterwork breastplate, other treasure)

thriae queen.description: This towering, shapely, purple-skinned woman has an insectile lower body, antennae on her brow, and the wings of a bee.

budget.name: thriae queen
budget.treasure: double (+2 axiomatic light mace, other treasure)

movanic deva.description: This angel is all sharp lines and angles, muscular but lean, with large wings and a mighty flaming greatsword.

thulgant.description: This monster has ten spidery legs, a head writhing with dripping tentacles above a clutch of red eyes, and three whipping stingers.

nightcrawler.description: This immense worm is covered with plates of dead-black, chitinous armor. Its toothy maw yawns like a cave.

kirin.description: With draconic scales covering much of its body, this staglike creature moves with awe-inspiring grace.

vulpinal.description: This bright-eyed, anthropomorphic fox is dressed in simple traveling clothes and carries a musical instrument in one hand.

winter wolf.description: This bear-sized wolf has white fur and a rime of frost around its muzzle. Its eyes are pale blue, almost white in color.

hydrodaemon.description: The skin on this frog-like fiend is clammy and its eyes look dead and milky; its wide face is split by a fanged maw.

mudlord.description: This fluid creature's roughly humanoid form is composed entirely of thick gobbets of soggy, brown mud.

shoggti.description: This pale creature has four suckered arms that end in pincers. A gnashing maw gapes in its head between two staring eyes.

bralani azata.description: Silver-white hair the color of a lightning strike whips about this poised elf-like archer, his eyes swirling with vibrant colors.

young cloud dragon.description: The blue-white scales of this four-horned Dragon exude wisps of fog. The dragons snout is short but filled with sharp teeth.

giant ant lion.description: This gigantic burrowing insect has an oversized abdomen. A terrifying set of long, hooked mandibles protrudes from its head.

leanan sidhe.description: This serene woman has pointed ears and flowing crimson hair, and wears an elegant dress and a crown of twigs.

trollhound.description: Foul-smelling fluids ooze from weeping sores across the scaly skin of this squat, powerful, and vaguely canine beast.

frost worm.description: This immense white worm has a single circular eye in the center of its head. Wisps of icy fog waft up from between its mandibles.

tyrant jelly.description: This amber-colored ooze contains the preserved larva of a giant insect, almost like a monstrous brain.

athach.description: This giant's maw contains a pair of dripping tusks, but it is its gangly third arm that makes its appearance truly bizarre.

budget.name: athach
budget.treasure: standard (leather armor, heavy shield, heavy mace, other treasure)

bodythief.description: This immense plant has jaws inside its central flower and vines that thresh the air. Its ovular seedpods throb like beating hearts.

goblin.description: This creature stands barely three feet tall, its scrawny, humanoid body dwarfed by its wide, ungainly head.

budget.name: goblin
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, light wooden shield, short sword, short bow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

half-fiend minotaur.description: This fiendish figure, complete with bat wings, claws, a fanged bull's head, and cloven feet, bellows a roar of challenge.

voonith.description: This brightly colored, long-necked amphibian has six legs, a fanged snout, and numerous finlets running down its spine.

tojanida.description: This creature resembles a cross between a turtle and a crab, with flippers instead of legs, a snapping beak, and two pincers.

aboleth.description: Four long tentacles writhe from this three-eyed fish-like creature's flanks, and its green body glistens with thick, clear slime.

grippli.description: Its slick skin a mottled pattern of bright colors, this agile, frog-like humanoid carries a bow and wears leather armor.

budget.name: grippli
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, 4 darts, net, short sword, other treasure)

drow noble.description: This dark-skinned elf stands in a battle-ready pose, her hair silver and eyes white and pupilless.

budget.name: drow noble
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (masterwork breastplate, heavy steel shield, masterwork rapier, drow poison (4), potion of invisibility, scroll of dispel magic, wand of cure light wounds (CL 1st, 20 charges), 400 gp, other treasure)

giant dragonfly.description: This glittering blue dragonfly is about the size of a horse and is large enough to carry off small farm animals or people.

apocalypse locust.description: An unnerving, buzzing drone emerges from a creature resembling a tortured human half transformed into a giant, winged scorpion.

weedwhip.description: This strange, vibrant plant slowly but dangerously whips about its trio of tendrils with spiked heads.

eremite.description: This blood-soaked humanoid is festooned with razored shards of metal. Skeletal wings protrude from its bleeding shoulders.

pseudodragon.description: This housecat-sized miniature dragon has fine scales, sharp horns, wicked little teeth, and a tail tipped with a barbed stinger.

ice yai.description: This blue-skinned giant has three eyes, fangs, and claws. Its hair seems to be formed of delicate strands of ice.

ancient crystal dragon.description: This brilliantly colored dragon has scales, teeth, and claws made of multicolored crystal, and its wings are sheets of flexible glass.

ancient brass dragon.description: A crest of horns sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a long neck and serpentine brass body.

tarn linnorm.description: This nightmarishly huge, snake-like dragon possesses two equally fearsome heads. Its twin jaws seethe with acid and poison.

jungle giant.description: This towering, plant-encrusted woman wields a massive bow, and her dark skin is decorated with numerous intricate tattoos.

budget.name: jungle giant
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork composite longbow [+8 Str] with 40 arrows, other treasure)

rakshasa.description: This figure's backward-bending fingers and its bestial, snarling visage leave little doubt as to its fiendish nature.

augnagar.description: This enormous, spider-like creature has three clawed tails and eight legs connected by leathery webs of flesh.

worg.description: This unusually large wolf has an evil, almost intelligent light shining in its deep red eyes.

soulsliver.description: This smooth-featured, humanoid creature appears to have skin made entirely of mirrored glass.

keketar.description: Colors dance over this serpentine creature's scales. A strange crown of energy glows above the thing's reptilian head.

ettin.description: This lumbering, filthy, two-headed giant wears tattered remnants of leather armor and clutches a large flail in each fist.

budget.name: ettin
budget.treasure: standard (leather armor, 2 flails, 4 javelins, other treasure)

jabberwock.description: This dragon has a long neck and terrible claws. The beast shrieks and babbles, thrashing its tail and wings in a violent manner.

belker.description: Dull, red eyes, grasping claws, and leathery wings give a demonic aspect to this creature's smoky form.

shira.description: Moving with deadly grace, this brutal, thickly furred humanoid figure's head is that of a lioness with dead black eyes.

qallupilluk.description: This hag's lumpy hide, tangled black hair, and ragged garments drip with icy water, though she has a curiously sweet smell.

young sovereign dragon.description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

yeth hound.description: This emaciated, hairless canine has a strange air of menace and cruelty about it.

ancient blue dragon.description: With scales the color of the desert sky, this large, serpentine dragon moves with an unsettling grace.

adult underworld dragon.description: This serpentine dragon has skin the color of deep volcanic rock, enormous claws, and jagged, stonelike horns and scales.

ceratioidi.description: This flabby, fishlike humanoid has the wide mouth, bulging eyes, and dangling, luminescent flesh lure of a deep-sea predator.
