giant bee.description: Striking yellow and black markings and a coat of bristling hairs cover this immense bee. Its stinger is the size of a dagger blade.

leng spider.description: This immense purple spider has a legspan of nearly forty feet and a hideously bloated body, yet still moves with fluid grace.

guardian naga.description: A contemplative humanoid face framed by a cobra-like hood adorns the body of this long, brightly colored serpent.

gynosphinx.description: This creature has the body of a lion, the wings of a falcon, and the head and torso of a beautiful human woman.

rune giant.description: This giant's skin is black and pitted, like roughly cast iron, and etched with glowing red runes.

budget.name: rune giant
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork full plate armor, masterwork longsword, 3 masterwork spears, other treasure)

soulbound mannequin.description: This strange construct is shaped like a masked humanoid made of wood and porcelain.

werebear.description: This humanoid is covered in shaggy fur and carries a heavy axe in one of his clawed hands..

budget.name: werebear
budget.treasure: NPC gear (chain shirt, masterwork battleaxe, 2 masterwork throwing axes, other treasure)

flail snail.description: This enormous snail has a brightly colored shell and four tentacles on its head, each tipped with a mace-like club.

phantom fungus.description: Portions of this three-stalked fungoid monster's body seem to fade in and out of sight. A large maw gapes along its entire front.

incubus.description: This darkly handsome humanoid's batlike wings, curving horns, and bestial legs betray his demonic origin.

formian queen.description: This large and majestic creature is nearly immobile, her massive abdomen swollen with her impending brood.

dragonne.description: This creature has the features of a lion but the wings and scales of a brass dragon, and a wild mane matching its scales.

dark dancer.description: Dancing in a wicked celebration, this slight humanoid is wrapped head to toe in dirty scraps of dark cloth.

budget.name: dark dancer
budget.treasure: standard (club, dagger, black smear poison [3 doses; Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 54], other gear)

lammasu.description: This majestic creature has the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and the face of a wise human man.

mobat.description: This bat has a wingspan the length of two humans, over-sized ears, and a squat, upturned snout with rows of needle-like teeth.

skum.description: This hunchbacked, green-skinned humanoid has a wide, frog-like head but a mouth more akin to that of a toothy fish.

oma.description: This whale-like creature floats ponderously, arcs of brilliant energy filling its mouth and rolling down its body.

raktavarna.description: What at first appears to be a bejeweled blade shimmers and writhes, transforming into a hideous, red-eyed serpent.

pugwampi.description: As if the world's most revolting lapdog had somehow learned to walk on its back legs, this sickly creature slinks forward carefully.

budget.name: pugwampi
budget.treasure: standard (dagger, shortbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

zombie lord.description: Gore stains this creature's tattered clothes, grimly appropriate garments for the rotting corpse inside.

oread.description: This large warrior appears heavy and solid, with chiseled, angular features that make her look almost like a statue brought to life.

budget.name: oread
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, longsword, composite longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

nabasu.description: This lanky fiend's mouth is filled with sharp fangs, while great bat-like wings stretch from its scaly hide.

werecrocodile.description: Standing taller than a man, this humanoid figure wears filth-covered rags over its scaly form.

morrigna.description: This beautiful woman wears a mask and is completely wrapped in spider silk. Magical fetishes adorn her clothing and staff.

adult cloud dragon.description: The blue-white scales of this four-horned Dragon exude wisps of fog. The dragons snout is short but filled with sharp teeth.

formian worker.description: This small, centaurlike ant creature bears a huge, bulging sack on its armored back.

budget.name: formian worker
budget.treasure: incidental (occasionally a 10-50 gp gem embedded into a worker's carapace)

immolation devil.description: Ash and embers encrust the smoldering humanoid frame of this imperious, dragon-winged devil.

assassin vine.description: This gnarled vine, as thick as a man's arm and bearing hand-shaped leaves, convulses across the ground in an unnatural slither.

cthulhu.description: This towering impossibility, neither quite octopus nor dragon nor giant but something far worse, must surely herald the end of times.

annis hag.description: This repulsive, hunchbacked crone has skin the color of a fresh bruise. Despite her hunch, she looms taller than a human.

spirit naga.description: Yellowed, venom-dripping fangs fill the human-like mouth of this sinister serpentine monstrosity.

hollow serpent.description: This creature looks like an oversized, empty snakeskin, its body covered in barbs and maw filled with jagged teeth.

vodyanoi.description: This humanoid salamander carries a gnarled staff in one hand. Tendrils drape its chin, resembling the beard of an eccentric hermit.

almiraj.description: This oversized rabbit has a single long, pearlescent horn protruding from its crown.

jackalwere.description: This armored humanoid has a jackal's head, bulging muscles, and a gaze that makes the world drift away.

budget.name: jackalwere
budget.treasure: standard (leather armor, masterwork battleaxe, other treasure)

rusalka.description: This beguiling female figure is partly obscured by long flowing hair that dances and flows around her as if she were underwater.

locathah.description: This lean humanoid bears crested fins on its head and back, and has the wide-eyed and wide-lipped face of a fish.

budget.name: locathah
budget.treasure: standard (longspear, light crossbow and 10 bolts, other treasure)

mummy.description: Wrapped from head to toe in ancient strips of moldering linen, this humanoid moves with a shuffling gait.

guecubu.description: A skeletal carcass pulls itself from the ground, its body formed as much from earth and soil as from bones and rotting flesh.

suli.description: This fine-featured humanoid wears exotic clothing and has flashing eyes; his arms are sheathed in a blaze of crackling flames.

budget.name: suli
budget.treasure: NPC gear (chainmail, scimitar, short bow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

manitou.description: An invisible presence suggests the shape of a giant-sized person, surrounded by a rhythm of subtle noises from the natural world.

rift drake.description: Horns jut from this muscular dragon's beaked head, and spikes cover the dragon's hide even in places on its winged arms.

adult sovereign dragon.description: This magnificent dragon is covered in splendid gold scales, and horns jut from its head like a crown.

leonal.description: This lion-headed humanoid has golden fur, sharp teeth, and long cat-like claws on its hands and feet.

shaitan.description: This being resembles a towering human with skin of polished stone and glittering agate eyes.

young brass dragon.description: A crest of horns sweeps back from the head of this dragon, leading to a long neck and serpentine brass body.

fachen.description: This half-bodied monstrosity with a toothy mouth and stringy hair hops about on its single leg with unusual grace.

tophet.description: A distended metal maw filled with blunt, sculpted teeth stretches across the upper portion of this rotund iron effigy.

ancient void dragon.description: This dragon's ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substancethat glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starrysky.

adult solar dragon.description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

gholdako.description: A single milky eye stares from the forehead of this towering giant wrapped in filthy, rune-covered strips of bloody linen.

greater shadow.description: This shadowy figure sways and moves with an erratic grace, as if lit by an unseen fire.

irminsul.description: A split in the trunk of this strange tree reveals a swirling magical portal to an unknown destination.

moss troll.description: This large and lanky moss-colored humanoid has an elongated, toothy snout and appears to be covered in bits of foliage.

gargoyle.description: Seemingly carved from a dark gray stone, this sinister crouching humanoid resembles a horned, winged demon.

caulborn.description: This creature has a split-jawed mouth, a hoodlike growth on its head, and two hideously elongated fingers on each hand.

adult vortex dragon.description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

zuvembie.description: This withered old corpse has a feral glint in her eyes and clasps a rusty axe in her yellow-nailed hands.

pooka.description: This creature combines the features of a sprightly girl and a black rabbit. A wicked, whimsical grin gleams on her face.

trox.description: This hulking juggernaut has two massively muscled arms and a group of four smaller ones that jut from under its rib cage.

budget.name: trox
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, warhammer, other treasure)

tzitzimitl.description: Crusted with rock, this immense skeletal figure flies swiftly through the air, strange gasses clinging to its nightmarish form.

hound archon.description: This canine-headed humanoid's well-groomed appearance and polished greatsword show it to be more than a common beast.

shulsaga.description: Jagged scales cover this lean humanoid's sculpted skin, glinting as it soars upon a disk of radiant energy.

budget.name: shulsaga
budget.treasure: standard (mwk longbow, mwk trident, other treasure)

hastur.description: This entity appears to be a skeletal human form hidden under tattered yellow robes, but it moves with unsettling, inhuman grace.

totenmaske.description: This spindly, skeletal humanoid has moldy green flesh, long talons for hands, and a head that seems to be mostly mouth.

harpy.description: Save for the tattered wings and taloned feet, this creature resembles a feral woman with a wild look about her.

budget.name: harpy
budget.treasure: standard (leather armor, morningstar, and other treasure)

adult umbral dragon.description: This sleek, dark dragon moves with a disturbing, serpentine grace, its eyes glowing as if lit from within by crimson embers.

kostchtchie.description: This towering giant with twisted legs has human skulls woven into hisbeard and holds an immense warhammer.

budget.name: kostchtchie
budget.treasure: triple (+5 adamantine icy burst warhammer, other treasure)

jyoti.description: This phoenix-like humanoid is surrounded by a halo of radiant energy. Its spear is tipped with a carved crystal blade.

budget.name: jyoti
budget.treasure: double (+1 ghost touch spear, other treasure)

shobhad.description: This gray-skinned goliath is lean and muscled. Its four powerful arms carry weapons, and it wears a leather chest harness.

budget.name: shobhad
budget.treasure: NPC gear (hide armor, 2 longswords, 2 javelins, shobhad longrifle with 20 bullets, other treasure)

aghasura.description: This immense creature looks like a horned rattlesnake, save for its two muscular arms, each of which wields a scimitar.

budget.name: aghasura
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork breastplate, 2 masterwork scimitars, other treasure)

monadic deva.description: This angelic being has smooth skin, a muscular body, and large golden wings, and wields a large mace.

tataka.description: This towering, blue-skinned woman has backward-facing hands and a feral, animal-like visage with exaggerated features.

wererat.description: This hunched creature looks like a human in studded leather, but fur covers its body. Its face is rat-like, and it has a long, naked tail.

budget.name: wererat
budget.treasure: NPC gear (masterwork studded leather, short sword, light crossbow with 20 bolts, other treasure)

ijiraq.description: Its head the skull of a caribou, this humanoid has wicked claws, and wears wrappings of ragged fur adorned with scrimshaw talismans.

royal naga.description: This snake-bodied creature has five necks, each with a regal, humanoid face in a cobralike hood.

spire drake.description: This reptilian creature's gaunt body, legs, and batlike face are covered in long spines. Two wings stretch out from its torso.

devourer.description: This dry, hovering corpse's chest is a prison of jagged ribs, within which is trapped a small tormented ghostly form.

troglodyte.description: This humanoid's scaly hide is dull gray. Its frame resembles that of a cave lizard, with a long tail and crests on its head and back.

urdefhan.description: This fanged humanoid has hideously transparent skin, revealing the vivid colors of internal organs and ivory bones inside its body.

budget.name: urdefhan
budget.treasure: NPC gear (studded leather, rhoka sword, composite longbow (+4 Str) with 20 arrows, other treasure)

tripurasura.description: This tiny monstrosity has the body of a well-muscled man, a crown of frilled horns, and eyes that glow like rubies.

young void dragon.description: This dragon's ebony scales and horns are flecked with a substancethat glows an eerie green. The folds of its wings reflect a starrysky.

grodair.description: Several water-dripping tentacles sprout from this four-eyed fish's belly, while long fins protrude from its back.

cloud giant.description: This towering giant has finely chiseled features. Her skin is pale and smooth, and her long wispy hair flutters as if in a breeze.

elder thing.description: This strange being has a star-shaped head and numerous writhing appendages arranged radially around its barrel-shaped body.

lava drake.description: This muscular two-legged dragon is covered with scales of thick volcanic stone.

pairaka.description: Blue-skinned and draped in revealing attire, this humanoid fiend has a sultry gaze suggesting all manner of debased pleasures.

adult sea dragon.description: The long, undulating body of this serpentine dragon rolls and bends with scales the color of the ocean's waves.

young lunar dragon.description: A shimmering halo surrounds this regal dragon's spine-crowned head, and its vast wings ripple like milky gossamer lit by the moon.

gibbering mouther.description: This horrid mass of eyes, mouths, and formless flesh stares in all directions, its countless maws yammering ceaselessly.

gnoll.description: Hunched and feral, this furred, hyena-headed humanoid stands slightly taller than the average human.

budget.name: gnoll
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, heavy wooden shield, battleaxe, longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

cernunnos.description: This tall, graceful person has elven features, the horns of a majestic stag and a piercing, ageless stare.

budget.name: cernunnos
budget.treasure: standard (+5 holy cold iron club, +5 evil outsider bane longbow, other treasure)

criosphinx.description: This creature has the wings of a bird, the body of a lion, and the head of a ram with sad, wise eyes.

nue.description: Materializing out of a noxious black cloud, this beast has the head of a fanged monkey and the body of a tiger with a viper as a tail.

gallowdead.description: This skeletal horror staggers under the weight of the massive hook and chain impaling the bones of its midsection.

kongamato.description: A massive draconic creature with a birdlike head dives from the sky, letting loose a piercing scream as it descends.

vegepygmy.description: Short, thin, and green, this small humanoid wields a spear. Tendrils of fungus dangle from its arms, midsection, and legs.

young magma dragon.description: Between this dragons jet-black scales run glowing rivulets of lava, and veins aglow with heat shine in the membranes of its wings.

hellwasp swarm.description: This hideous, buzzing cloud of insects is comprised of black and yellow wasps with hungry red eyes.

ghoul.description: This humanoid creature has long, sharp teeth, and its pallid flesh is stretched tightly over its starved frame.

river giant.description: This slender giant dresses in simple clothes and has swirling patterns on her green skin.

manananggal.description: This disembodied female torso flaps through the air on batlike wings, her fanged face a hateful mask.

giant tarantula.description: A massive tarantula covered in bristly hairs strides forward with deliberate steps, its eight eyes scanning for prey.

adult green dragon.description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

garuda.description: This winged creature has clawed hands and bird's talons. Large, glinting eyes and a serrated beak dominate its avian face.

budget.name: garuda
budget.treasure: double (+1 shock composite longbow [+3 Str], other treasure)

dire weasel.description: This bear-sized predator is long and low-slung. Its soft fur and intelligent expression contrast with its glistening fangs.

peryton.description: This creature has a stag's body, a hawk's wings and talons, and the head of a slavering wolf with a rack of sharp antlers on its brow.

sacristan.description: Chains and piercings torture this being's bloodless flesh. The greatest violations invade its face and mouth.

terra-cotta soldier.description: This perfectly sculpted, finely detailed, life-sized clay figure has a look of fierce determination and a sword clenched in each hand.

kodama.description: This little green humanoid figure stands only three feet tall. Its head is faceless save for two hollow pits for eyes.

djinni.description: This creature stands nearly twice as tall as a human, although its lower torso trails away into a vortex of mist and wind.

young forest dragon.description: This massive serpentine and wingless creature has jade scales and antlers, and sounds like grinding stones as it stalks forth.

ankheg.description: This burrowing, bug-like monster scuttles about on six legs, drooling noxious green ichor from its clacking mandibles.

basidirond.description: This strange plant consists of four spidery stalks, long green tendrils, and an inverted bell-shaped cap filled with spores.

vishkanya.description: This lithe woman wears loose-fitting robes and wields a cruel-looking blade. Her eyes are pure white orbs.

salamander.description: This snake-bodied humanoid hisses with anger. Spines of crackling flame dance along the creature's blackened, fiery-red scales.

seugathi.description: This worm-like monster has a hideous face of eyes and hooked jaws. It wields a wand and a sword in its twin tentacle tails.

budget.name: seugathi
budget.treasure: double (masterwork short sword, wand of magic missile [CL 5th, 1d20+30 charges])

taiga linnorm.description: With menacing black horns jutting from its head, this two-legged dragon is covered in dark green scales and vicious black barbs.

void yai.description: This towering, three-eyed horned giant carries himself with the self-assurance of an undefeated champion of countless wars.

budget.name: void yai
budget.treasure: double (masterwork full plate, masterwork greatclub, other treasure)

faceless stalker.description: This hairless, leathery biped has a face dominated by grotesque and unsettling whorls and slits instead of actual features.

nightmare ettercap.description: This strange humanoid looks like a gangly, distorted caricature of an ettercap, with spiderlike fingers and an enormous wicked grin.

vanth.description: This humanoid skeleton has black raven wings, a long tail, and a polished vulture-like mask where its face should be.

basilisk.description: This squat, reptilian monster has eight legs, bony spurs jutting from its back, and eyes that glow with pale green fire.

hell hound.description: This creature resembles a thin, lanky wolf with reddish-brown fur, white claws, and burning, fiery red eyes.

marilith.description: This snake-bodied fiend has a six-armed woman's torso, pointed ears, and glittering, otherworldly eyes.

goliath spider.description: This massive brown-and-green tarantula is the size of a large house and has huge, razor-sharp fangs.

manticore.description: This creature has a vaguely humanoid head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon. Its tail ends in long, sharp spikes.

shikigami.description: This tiny, crudely carved statue of a robed man has glowing runes running across its surface.

dire bear.description: Spittle drips from this feral bear's roaring maw, and its matted fur is broken in places by wicked, bony growths.

dire ape.description: Sharp teeth fill this large, feral ape's mouth, and its long, muscular arms stretch to the ground, ending in wickedly curved claws.

slithering tracker.description: A long, moist streak along the dark stone suddenly undulates like a serpent and then rises up to attack.

bokrug.description: This great reptilian monster is an aquatic lizard with a beard of tentacles and a sting-tipped tail.

neothelid.description: Its slime-drenched length coiled upon itself in a shuddering mountain, this huge worm's tentacled head rises like a snake's.

solar.description: This towering humanoid creature has shining topaz eyes, metallic skin, and three pairs of white wings.

budget.name: solar
budget.treasure: double (+5 full plate, +5 dancing greatsword, +5 composite longbow [+9 Str bonus])

d'ziriak.description: This four-armed creature looks like a cross between a human and a black and ochre termite. Its body and arms display glowing runes.

cyclops.description: A single huge eye stares from the forehead of this nine-foot-tall giant. Below this sole orb, an even larger mouth gapes like a cave.

budget.name: cyclops
budget.treasure: standard (hide armor, Large greataxe, Large heavy crossbow, other treasure)

vulnudaemon.description: A bloody, tooth-filled mouth that looks almost like a horrific gash gasps in the neck of this pale, childlike horror.

einherji.description: Holding a massive battleaxe and shield, this tall, helmed warrior is grim and fierce.

budget.name: einherji
budget.treasure: triple (+2 scale mail, +2 heavy wooden shield, +2 battleaxe, masterwork throwing axe)

astradaemon.description: Vaguely humanoid in shape, this gaunt fiend has the face of a hideous fish and a body of lanky limbs and writhing tendrils.

erlking.description: Birdlike wings covered with autumnal leaves instead of feathers extend from the back of this regal, elf-like humanoid.

budget.name: erlking
budget.treasure: double (ironwood chain shirt, ironwood longbow, ironwood longsword, other treasure)

jinmenju.description: A low hum surrounds this huge, gnarled tree. The rotten fruits that hang from its sickly branches look vaguely like human heads.

ancient green dragon.description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

witchwyrd.description: This gray-skinned humanoid wears fine red robes. The being has four arms, each ending in a three-fingered hand.

dragon turtle.description: This long-tailed aquatic beast resembles a massive snapping turtle with draconic features.

hyakume.description: This bloated creature's eyes protrude from between the fleshy fat rolls of its neckless, hulking form.

baku.description: This floating creature has long brown fur. Its face features a pair of long tusks and a curious elongated trunk for a snout.

roper.description: A huge eye opens in this conical creature's front, just above a toothy mouth. Long strands of fibrous material whip from its sides.

phoenix.description: This immense bird seems to be made of living flame. It spreads its wings and gives vent to a musical cry as it takes to the air.

giant jellyfish.description: The bell of this enormous amber jellyfish is as large as a carriage. A sinister bloom of tentacles dangles and writhes below.

contemplative.description: This floating creature is mostly pulsating brain-sac, with an atrophied manikin body hanging under it.

great cyclops.description: This misshapen but incredibly muscular humanoid has a single huge bloodshot eye set under a short, jagged horn on its brow.

budget.name: great cyclops
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork greatclub, hide armor, other treasure)

young vortex dragon.description: This dragon twists and whips with near untraceable speed. Its horns, crests along its neck, and wings emit a glow like starlight.

akata.description: This hairless blue lion has twin tentacular tails. Dozens more thick tentacles quiver and twitch where its mane should be.

succubus.description: Tiny horns, bat-like wings, and a sinuous tail betray the demonic nature of this alluring woman.

oceanid.description: This beautiful woman is clad only in sea foam and her long, white hair, which cascades over her body.

agyra.description: This two-headed monstrosity has vast wings and a long tail covered in a forest of blades.

sayona.description: This revolting withered corpse of a woman is dressed in revealing clothes, its bare skin wet with fresh blood.

merfolk.description: Slipping in and out of the crashing waves, this beautiful woman has the lower torso of a long, slender fish.

budget.name: merfolk
budget.treasure: NPC gear (trident, heavy crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

nuglub.description: This hideous, hunchbacked creature has three glowing blue eyes. Oily hair grows from its head and back, covering it like a cloak.

tengu.description: Black feathers cover this crow-headed humanoid, and its hands and legs end in powerful talons.

budget.name: tengu
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, dagger, short bow and 20 arrows, other treasure)

guardian dragon.description: This immense dragon coils its long, serpentine body beneath spreading wings, its eyes glittering like burnished gold.

budget.name: guardian dragon
budget.treasure: triple, plus one artifact or major item

ancient white dragon.description: This dragon's scales are a frosty white. Its head is crowned with slender horns, with a thin membrane stretched between them.

marid.description: This being resembles a powerful giant with hairless blue-green skin, deep blue eyes, flamboyant eyebrows, and pearlescent teeth.

gaki.description: This skeletal creature with a long, thin neck seems to float above the ground. Its jaw is elongated, showing sharp, worn teeth.

adult forest dragon.description: This massive serpentine and wingless creature has jade scales and antlers, and sounds like grinding stones as it stalks forth.

shadow.description: Barely seen out of the corner of the eye, this wisp of shadow is vaguely humanoid in outline and writhes with unholy life.

kalavakus.description: This muscular, violet demon walks upon elephantine feet. Large, razor-sharp horns cover its body.

grindylow.description: With a large head and numerous teeth, this unsightly creature resembles a goblin from the waist up and a greasy octopus below.

peri.description: This beautiful albino woman is wreathed in wings of brilliant flame.

budget.name: peri
budget.treasure: triple (+2 flaming burst scimitar, other treasure)

desert drake.description: This sleek dragon has scales mottled in desert colors, lacks forelimbs, and sports massive wings on its lissome back.

sasquatch.description: Tall, burly, and hairy, this humanoid creature wields a large tree branch for a club and has a swinging, apelike gait.

giant flytrap.description: This towering plant is a mass of vines and barbs. Several stalks are horribly mobile, each ending in a set of green, toothy jaws.

adult sky dragon.description: Although wingless, this dragon twists gracefully though the sky, its scales reflecting the shifting hues of the heavens.

carbuncle.description: This small, awkward reptile with a fist-sized gem jutting from between its two bulging eyes seems both surprised and perplexed.

fire yai.description: This fanged, three-eyed giant rages in its finely crafted armor, its skin as red as a smoldering ember.

budget.name: fire yai
budget.treasure: standard (+1 banded mail, +1 katana*, other treasure)

hungry flesh.description: A quivering pile of tumorous flesh, this creature leaves a trail of slime as it hungrily searches for sustenance.

gathlain.description: Wings composed of wood and vines grow out of the body of this lithesome fey.

catoblepas.description: This ugly creature has a boar-like head with short antlers, a thick bullish body covered in spines, and cloven hooves on its stumpy legs.

peluda.description: This long-necked dragon has steamy breath, a lashing tail, and a back covered in hundreds of quills.

grimple.description: This putrid-looking humanoid bears a disquieting resemblance to a half-starved, mange-ridden opossum.

young gold dragon.description: Golden scales cover the body of this majestic dragon, and a regal crest of horns arches backward above wise and piercing eyes.

adult gold dragon.description: Golden scales cover the body of this majestic dragon, and a regal crest of horns arches backward above wise and piercing eyes.

mi-go.description: This unnaturally graceful creature has a bulbous fungoid lump for a head, spiny insectoid wings, and a tangle of spiky, clawed legs.

mohrg.description: A thick tangle of discolored entrails clings to this lurching skeleton's torso and winds upward to loll from its jaw like a clawed tongue.

accuser devil.description: This childlike blasphemy conjoins the features of a plump human infant and a gigantic, gore-fattened fly.

dullahan.description: Clad in ragged black robes and tarnished armor, this grim, headless rider is surrounded by an aura of menace.

budget.name: dullahan
budget.treasure: double (+1 full plate, +1 longsword, other treasure)

invisible stalker.description: No true form can be detected, yet a sense of force and hulking malevolence is undeniable in this creature's presence.

mummified gynosphinx.description: Wrapped in strips of linen, this creature with tattered wings looks like it used to have the hindquarters of a lion and a woman's face.

nemesis devil.description: This ancient monstrosity has the torso of a massively muscled giant, scaly wings, and the lower half of a four-legged, clawed beast.

lillend azata.description: This creature has the body of a seductive, winged elven woman from the waist up and that of a snake from the waist down.

taiga giant.description: This muscular giant has dark gray skin and fiery red hair. Its lower jaw bears sharp fangs, and it wields a huge, primitive spear.

werebat.description: This furred humanoid has protruding fangs and thin membranes of tissue connecting its arms to its sides.

budget.name: werebat
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, mwk shortbow with 20 arrows, mwk short sword, other treasure)

young green dragon.description: Scales the color of emeralds armor this ferocious dragon. A single sharp horn protrudes from the end of its toothy snout.

tooth fairy.description: This gaunt fairy has tattered ears, black eyes, and a huge mouth filled with mismatched teeth. It carries an oversized pair of pliers.

nuckelavee.description: This skinless creature resembles a horse and its humanoid rider, fused into a single hideous being of rage and sickness.

gug.description: This towering menace has a horrible, vertically aligned mouth and arms that split at the elbows into twin clawed hands.

leaf leshy.description: This little plant person is clad in a winglike leaf cloak and pinecone armor, wielding a twig as a makeshift spear.

medusa.description: This slender, attractive woman has strangely glowing eyes and a full head of hissing snakes for hair.

budget.name: medusa
budget.treasure: double (dagger, masterwork longbow with 20 arrows, other treasure)

axiomite.description: As this lithe humanoid moves, its flesh shimmers and wavers, temporarily breaking apart into motes of shimmering light.

draconal.description: This noble creature seems to be part serpent, part humanoid, and part dragon, with great wings and a crown of horns.

popobala.description: This brawny, sallow-skinned figure is muscular but lean, with batlike wings and a single hideous eye in its noseless face.

jotund troll.description: This immense green-skinned brute wields a tree branch for a club and has nine heads, each filled with jutting teeth and tusks.

deathweb.description: This animated husk from an enormous spider seems filled with thousands of living spiders that fall from its body like drops of blood.

silvanshee.description: This black cat has gray stripes, violet eyes, and an unusual white blaze on its chest.

augur.description: A single eye peers from behind the armor plates and keen-edged blades that compose the cage-like exterior of this tiny flying orb.

drow.description: This dark-skinned elf stands in a battle-ready pose, her hair silver and eyes white and pupilless.

budget.name: drow
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, light steel shield, rapier, hand crossbow with 20 bolts, drow poison [2 doses], 3d6 gp, other treasure)

adaro.description: This hybrid of human and shark holds its spear menacingly, thick, glistening saliva dripping from its razor-sharp teeth.

ice linnorm.description: A snake-like, dragon-headed monster of tremendous size rises up, drifts of snow and ice tumbling from its coiling flanks.

tarry demodand.description: This lithe, toothy creature's jet-black skin looks like living tar, and ooze drips from the claws that cap its long arms.

budget.name: tarry demodand
budget.treasure: standard (masterwork breastplate, 2 masterwork short swords, other treasure)

owlbear.description: An amalgam of fur and feathers, this bizarre half-bear, half-owl monstrosity raises its huge, ursine claws in anger.

mephit.description: This small humanoid creature has thin, leathery wings, small horns, and a mischievous smile.

dossenus.description: This small creature looks like a lumpy head with crab legs and a giant mouth filled with stone teeth.

mimic.description: What appeared to be a chest filled with treasure comes to life as it grows long, glistening tentacles and a number of sharp teeth.

barghest.description: This snarling, canine beast pads forward on all fours, its slender front limbs looking more like hands than a wolf's paws.

nessian warhound.description: This creature resembles a powerfully built wolf the size of a large draft horse, with ebony fur and burning, fiery red eyes.

selkie.description: This sleek, aquatic creature has short gray fur, webbed hands ending in sharp claws, and a mouth full of pointed teeth.

nightwing.description: This enormous, bat-like creature is shaped from utter darkness, its eyes tiny red stars in the blackest night.

kyton.description: Wickedly barbed chains adorn this lean figure, and gaps in the bindings reveal deathly pale flesh etched with jagged scars.

quasit.description: Ram horns curl back from the twisted head of this tiny winged demon, and its body is thin and wiry.

destrachan.description: The hunched, reptilian beast lopes on two clawed feet, its eyeless head dominated by a huge circular maw filled with jagged teeth.

vildeis.description: This red-winged angel is blindfolded and wrapped with bloody bandages. What shows of her flesh is scarred with celestial runes.

ratling.description: This ratlike creature has tiny human hands in place of its front paws, and an unnerving human face with a toothy mouth.

ancient umbral dragon.description: This sleek, dark dragon moves with a disturbing, serpentine grace, its eyes glowing as if lit from within by crimson embers.

seaweed leshy.description: This vaguely humanoid plant creature has a body formed of soggy green seaweed and wears crude armor made from seashells.

immortal ichor.description: This strange—almost beautiful—purple ooze thrums with powerful energy and glows with an eerie light.

ancient solar dragon.description: This regal dragon glows like the sun. Its burnished wings shimmer the color of flames, and a crown of horns decorates its head.

derro.description: This pale blue humanoid has bulging white eyes, wild hair, four-fingered hands, and a large hooked club.

budget.name: derro
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, short sword or aklys, repeating light crossbow with 10 poisoned bolts, other treasure)

gorynych.description: This sleek, three-headed dragon rears up on its hind legs, wings spread and flames licking out from behind three sets of fangs.

barbed devil.description: From the tip of its lashing tail to the serrated features of its fang-filled visage, this fiery-eyed sentinel bristles with barbs.

ice troll.description: This large creature has light blue-green skin and cold, piercing eyes. Dressed in rough furs, its tusked jaw juts forth in a long underbite.

water yai.description: This towering woman has blue skin, small fangs, and a third eye glaring from her forehead. Her robes are soaking wet.

juvenile seps.description: This venomous snake is heavily armored and has unusually large fangs.

ocean giant.description: This blue-skinned giant's clothing and beard whip about like sails caught in a storm.

redcap.description: Like some miniscule, wicked old man, this snarling little humanoid wears metal boots and a blood-red pointed cap.

budget.name: redcap
budget.treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, Medium scythe, other treasure)

shaggy demodand.description: This toad-faced humanoid is bloated and swollen, with folds of obsidian skin hanging down beneath two immense bat wings.

desert giant.description: Loose robes conceal the sand-etched features of this lanky giant. In each hand he grips a scimitar nearly the length of a human.

budget.name: desert giant
budget.treasure: standard (2 masterwork scimitars, leather armor, other treasure)

dire hyena.description: This large hyena has a thick head, rheumy red eyes, and a mouth filled with sharp, powerful teeth.

ogrekin.description: Its body twisted and deformed, this lumbering giant has tiny eyes and a mouth of jagged teeth presented in a furious roar.

large spriggan.description: Flecks of saliva drip from the corners of this filthy and ill-smelling humanoid, and his large pointed ears twitch at every sound.It resembles an ugly gnome with an alien, feral appearance, but much more hale and muscular

budget.name: large spriggan
budget.treasure: NPC Gear (leather armor, masterwork morningstar, light crossbow with 10 bolts, other treasure)

clockwork soldier.description: Cogs and gears are visible in the gaps of this metallic creature's armor. It wields a polearm as it stands ready at attention.

crucidaemon.description: Its body seemingly made of iron, this shapely feminine form has wrists pierced by chains that end in curved blades.

mandragora.description: This filthy creature resembles a small, wide-mouthed fat child made from leaves, vines, tree bark, dirt, and pallid tubers.

ancient silver dragon.description: The scales of this tall, elegant dragon shine like polished silver, and its tail has a feathered appearance.
